item.description: Hello! I am a researcher at the University of Trento, Italy in the Security Research Group under the supervision of Prof. Fabio Massacci. Previous to that, I was fortunate enough to join the Information Security and Cryptography Group of Prof. Michael Backes at CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security in Saarbrücken, Germany and be supervised by Dr. Robert Künnemann.
